definition[0]: a long piece of writing about a particular subject that you do as part of an advanced university degree such as an MA or a PhD
example[0]: Cynthia’s still working on her thesis.
example[1]: He wrote his doctoral thesis on contemporary French literature.
definition[1]: an idea or opinion about something, that you discuss in a formal way and give examples for
example[2]: Their main thesis was that the rise in earnings was due to improvements in education.
definition[2]: in writing, the thesis is the sentence or group of sentences which state what the main idea of an essay is
example[3]: a paragraph introducing your thesis statement
